ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] FW: Lullaby tale
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, at 34 I would *not* wanna race either Grimfeather nor Shadowmen - even with Mistmoore drum.  At 37, with MM drum, I am pretty sure I was beatin Grim -
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, at 34 I would *not* wanna race either Grimfeather nor Shadowmen - even
with Mistmoore drum. At 37, with MM drum, I am pretty sure I was beatin
Grim - never actually ran from Shadowmen.

Sylly

p.s. at 35, down to less than a bub of hp and with Grim on my butt and
closing, one last desperate measure, siren song! It stuck, /pet guard here,
selos'd across the wood bridge to safety. whew, i did not want to die.

----- Original Message -----
From: Kevin L. Crawford <Lyrnia@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, April 07, 2000 10:11 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] FW: Lullaby tale


> Yup, with a drum a bard can outrun just about anything in the game
starting
> at around oh... level 5 ;) As long as they aren't in the "slowdown" area.
>
> At level 34 I can outrun anything even with about 50hp if I have a drum
> equipped.
